caption: Imagine a dark, atmospheric video game scene. The background is shrouded in shadows, with the faint outline of a wooden door barely visible. As you approach, you can hear the soft creaking of the door as it slowly swings open, revealing a dimly lit room beyond.

Imagine a serene underwater scene, viewed from above. The gentle lapping of waves against a distant shore creates a soothing rhythm in the background. In the foreground, three playful fish are the stars of the show. One, a sleek eel, undulates gracefully through the water, its body creating a series of rhythmic whooshes as it moves. Another fish, perhaps a sunfish, bobs lazily along, its fins creating soft, fluttering sounds as it glides. The third fish, with its distinctive L-shaped tail, darting back and forth with energy and enthusiasm, produces a series of rapid, staccato clicks and pops as it swims. The overall atmosphere is one of tranquility and gentle movement, with the underwater world coming alive through the subtle sounds of its inhabitants."

Imagine the soft gurgle of water flowing from a sleek, modern faucet. Picture the gentle splash of a hand submerged in the basin, perhaps lathering with soap. There's a subtle rustle as someone reaches for a towel, its fabric sliding against skin.

Imagine a vast, open expanse of deep blue water, its surface gently rippling under the warm embrace of the sun. The sound of waves lapping softly against an unseen shore creates a soothing rhythm, punctuated by the occasional splash of a fish breaking the surface.
